review: Nice gadget. Takes up very little space.  A lot easier to pick up and take to a friends house than a console. Other than the media streaming the games are entertaining. Don't have to worry about paying for a network membership like I did with Xbox, just need WiFi or a LAN line. The boardgames they have, "Life" in particular, help pass time and easy to put down then resume later.  No hardcore platform games but that's not the purpose of this device. With the HDMI connection the resolution and clarity are great.
author: Jeffrey A Cox II

review: I was pleasantly surprised how this little gadget works. Easy to install and use! The speed on this is awesome. Already having the Amazon Prime membership, it was a deal I couldn't turn down. So far the apps I have used, Hulu and Pandora work at faster speeds on Amazon Fire than my Dish, Sony Blue Ray and Wii. The process is convenient and quick to operate. Love the voice command feature! Works very well in my opinion. It may be my imagination, the sound quality seems to be more crisp. Normally I wait to buy new techno products, but not this time. Love Amazon and I trust them!
